==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=转}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|車|專|c1=s|c2=p|t1=carriage|ls=psc}} – to transport in a [[cart]].

===Etymology===
Possibly related to:
* Old {{cog|bo|འདྲུལ||to transmit; to communicate}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}), or
* {{cog|bo|སྲུལ||to move to and fro; to stir}}, {{cog|my|ရွေ့||to move; to be displaced}}, {{m|my|ရွှေ့||to move or shift something}} ({{zh-ref|Starostin}}).

An [[allofam]] is perhaps ''*don'' (“round”). Compare {{cog|vi|tròn||round; circle; entire; whole}}, {{m|vi|trọn||fully; completely; all}}, as well as the following Chinese words:
* {{och-l|團|ball; circle; lump}},
* {{och-l|摶|to roll up into a ball}}.

Derivative: {{och-l|傳|to relay; to pass on; to transfer; relay station; biography; record}}.

====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|transitive}} to [[turn]]; to [[revolve]]
# to [[wind]]; to [[entwine]]
# [[winding]]; [[circuitous]]
# to [[change]]; to [[shift]]; to [[alter]]
# to [[change]] [[direction]]; to [[turn]]
# {{lb|zh|Southwest Mandarin|dialectal|_|Cantonese|Hakka|Min|Wu}} to [[return]]; to [[come]] or [[go]] [[back]]
#* {{zh-x|轉來|to come back; to return|tr=2tsoe le|SH}}
#* {{zh-x|轉去|to go back; to return|tr=2tsoe qi|SH}}
# {{lb|zh|Wu}} to [[think]]; to [[contemplate]]; to [[turn over]] in one's mind
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[mediate]]; to [[reconcile]]
# {{lb|zh|dialectal Mandarin}} {{zh-classifier|[[time]]s or [[round]] [[trip]]s}}
# to [[change]] [[position]]; to [[move]]
# to [[wave]]; to [[flutter]]
# to [[divert]]; to [[transfer]]
# to [[evade]]; to [[avoid]]
# to be [[transfer]]red to another [[post]]
# to [[sell]]; to [[transfer]] the [[ownership]]
# to [[transport]]; to [[relay]]; to [[carry]] in a [[cart]]
# to [[discard]]; to [[abandon]]
# to [[leave]]; to [[depart]]
# to [[chant]]; to [[utter]] (spell); to [[recite]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}
